name: ProviderWhoReferredThePatientDidNotReceiveTheReport
title: Provider Who Referred the Patient Did Not Receive the Report
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Care Coordination),(Data Element Scope: HCPCS G code: "Provider who referred the patient to another provider did not receive the report from the provider to whom the patient was referred"),(Inclusion Criteria: Provides way to document the referral loop was not closed.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

concept.display: Provider who referred the patient to another provider did not receive a report from the provider to whom the patient was referred

contains.display: Clinician who referred the patient to another clinician did not receive a report from the clinician to whom the patient was referred
